amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the text of the bill with language that creates a Federal criminal offense for harm to a pregnant woman.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 2 printed in H. Rept. 106-348 to establish a Federal crime for any violent or assaultive conduct against a pregnant woman that interrupts or terminates her pregnancy.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Lofgren.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 224 (Roll no. 464).
